item.title: A Payload to Rule Them All
item.description: a-payload-to-rule-them-all This one gives us a post endpoint for a payload that needs to exploit xxe, xss, and sqli (sql injection), as well as the code for the server.
item.content:
a-payload-to-rule-them-all

This one gives us a post endpoint for a payload that needs to exploit xxe, xss, and sqli (sql injection), as well as the code for the server.
